conclusion: FAILED - Two-phase restart approach is fundamentally flawed. Score WORSE (1.0986 vs 1.1688) and timing OVER BUDGET (175.7 vs 60 min). Phase 2 refinement adds overhead without improving accuracy, and small sigma reduces diversity.
recommendation: ABANDON - Do not pursue further tuning. Restart strategies don't help when CMA-ES already converges well in single phase.
